rules.title: Required columns
rules.description: aip_ref_code, program_project_description, implementing_agency, start_date, completion_date, expected_output, source_of_funds, and total must exist and not be an empty string.

rules.title: Date validity
rules.description: start_date and completion_date must be valid month-name/month-only values or numeric date format M/D/YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY.

rules.title: Numeric columns
rules.description: personal_services, maintenance_and_other_operating_expenses, capital_outlay, total, climate_change_adaptation, and climate_change_mitigation must be number or null.

rules.title: Total arithmetic consistency
rules.description: total must equal personal_services + maintenance_and_other_operating_expenses + capital_outlay, treating null as 0, with tolerance of 1.00 peso.

rules.title: Climate expenditure bounds
rules.description: climate_change_adaptation + climate_change_mitigation must be <= total, treating null as 0, with tolerance of 1.00 peso.

rules.title: CC typology code format
rules.description: cc_topology_code must be null or match pattern A###-##.

rules.title: PRM/NCR indicator presence
rules.description: If any indicator keys exist (prm_ncr_lgu_rm_objective_results_indicator, prm_ncr_lgu, rm_objective, results_indicator), each must be null or a non-empty string; do not require absent keys.

rules.title: Non-negative money
rules.description: All numeric budget fields (PS/MOOE/CO/total/climate fields) must be >= 0 when not null.
